verses.verse: דִּ֭בְרֵי <S%H1697><s%> The words לְמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H3927><s%> Lemuel מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king מַ֝שָּׂ֗א <S%H4853><s%> the prophecy אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִסְּרַ֥תּוּ <S%H3256><s%> taught אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> that his mother

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What בְּ֭רִי <S%H1248><s%> son וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What בַּר־ <S%H1248><s%> son בִּטְנִ֑י <S%H990><s%> belly וּ֝מֶה <S%H4100><s%> What בַּר־ <S%H1248><s%> son נְדָרָֽי׃ <S%H5088><s%> vow

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Give לַנָּשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> unto women חֵילֶ֑ךָ <S%H2428><s%> not thy strength וּ֝דְרָכֶ֗יךָ <S%H1870><s%> nor thy ways לַֽמְח֥וֹת <S%H4229><s%> to that which destroyeth מְלָכִֽין׃ <S%H4428><s%> kings

אַ֤ל <S%H408><s%> for לַֽמְלָכִ֨ים ׀ <S%H4428><s%> [It is] not for kings לְֽמוֹאֵ֗ל <S%H3927><s%> O Lemuel אַ֣ל <S%H408><s%> for לַֽמְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> [it is] not for kings שְׁתוֹ־ <S%H8354><s%> to drink יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וּ֝לְרוֹזְנִ֗ים <S%H7336><s%> princes [אֹו כ] (אֵ֣י <S%H176><s%> and ק) שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> strong drink

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <S%H8354><s%> Lest they drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> and forget מְחֻקָּ֑ק <S%H2710><s%> the law וִֽ֝ישַׁנֶּה <S%H8138><s%> and pervert דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> the judgment כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted עֹֽנִי׃ <S%H6040><s%> misery

תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give שֵׁכָ֣ר <S%H7941><s%> strong drink לְאוֹבֵ֑ד <S%H6><s%> unto him that is ready to perish וְ֝יַיִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine לְמָ֣רֵי <S%H4751><s%> unto those that be of heavy נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> hearts

יִ֭שְׁתֶּה <S%H8354><s%> Let him drink וְיִשְׁכַּ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> and forget רִישׁ֑וֹ <S%H7389><s%> his poverty וַ֝עֲמָל֗וֹ <S%H5999><s%> his misery לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִזְכָּר־ <S%H2142><s%> and remember עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

פְּתַח־ <S%H6605><s%> Open פִּ֥יךָ <S%H6310><s%> thy mouth לְאִלֵּ֑ם <S%H483><s%> for the dumb אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for דִּ֝֗ין <S%H1779><s%> in the cause כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of all such as are appointed חֲלֽוֹף׃ <S%H2475><s%> to destruction

פְּתַח־ <S%H6605><s%> Open פִּ֥יךָ <S%H6310><s%> thy mouth שְׁפָט־ <S%H8199><s%> judge צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteously וְ֝דִ֗ין <S%H1777><s%> and plead עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> the cause of the poor וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> and needy פ

אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife חַ֭יִל <S%H2428><s%> a virtuous מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> Who can find וְרָחֹ֖ק <S%H7350><s%> [is] far מִפְּנִינִ֣ים <S%H6443><s%> above rubies מִכְרָֽהּ׃ <S%H4377><s%> pay

בָּ֣טַח <S%H982><s%> doth safely trust בָּ֭הּ לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> The heart בַּעְלָ֑הּ <S%H1167><s%> of her husband וְ֝שָׁלָ֗ל <S%H7998><s%> of spoil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יֶחְסָֽר׃ <S%H2637><s%> in her so that he shall have no need

גְּמָלַ֣תְהוּ <S%H1580><s%> She will do ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> him good וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> and not evil כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּֽיה׃ <S%H2416><s%> of her life

דָּ֭רְשָׁה <S%H1875><s%> She seeketh צֶ֣מֶר <S%H6785><s%> wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6593><s%> and flax וַ֝תַּ֗עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and worketh בְּחֵ֣פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> willingly כַּפֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H3709><s%> with her hands

הָ֭יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּאֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> ships סוֹחֵ֑ר <S%H5503><s%> She is like the merchants' מִ֝מֶּרְחָ֗ק <S%H4801><s%> from afar תָּבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> she bringeth לַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H3899><s%> her food

וַתָּ֤קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> She riseth בְּע֬וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> also while it is yet night וַתִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and giveth טֶ֣רֶף <S%H2964><s%> meat לְבֵיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> to her household וְ֝חֹ֗ק <S%H2706><s%> and a portion לְנַעֲרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5291><s%> to her maidens

זָמְמָ֣ה <S%H2161><s%> She considereth שָׂ֭דֶה <S%H7704><s%> a field וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <S%H3947><s%> and buyeth מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> it with the fruit כַ֝פֶּ֗יהָ <S%H3709><s%> of her hands [נְטַע כ] (נָ֣טְעָה <S%H5193><s%> fastened ק) כָּֽרֶם׃ <S%H3754><s%> a vineyard
חָֽגְרָ֣ה <S%H2296><s%> She girdeth בְע֣וֹז <S%H5797><s%> with strength מָתְנֶ֑יהָ <S%H4975><s%> her loins וַ֝תְּאַמֵּ֗ץ <S%H553><s%> and strengtheneth זְרֹעוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H2220><s%> her arms

טָ֭עֲמָה <S%H2938><s%> She perceiveth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good סַחְרָ֑הּ <S%H5504><s%> that her merchandise לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִכְבֶּ֖ה <S%H3518><s%> goeth not out [בַלַּיִל כ] (בַלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night ק) נֵרָֽהּ׃ <S%H5216><s%> her candle

יָ֭דֶיהָ <S%H3027><s%> her hands שִׁלְּחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> She layeth בַכִּישׁ֑וֹר <S%H3601><s%> to the spindle וְ֝כַפֶּ֗יהָ <S%H3709><s%> and her hands תָּ֣מְכוּ <S%H8551><s%> hold פָֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H6418><s%> the distaff

כַּ֭פָּהּ <S%H3709><s%> her hand פָּרְשָׂ֣ה <S%H6566><s%> She stretcheth out לֶעָנִ֑י <S%H6041><s%> to the poor וְ֝יָדֶ֗יהָ <S%H3027><s%> her hands שִׁלְּחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> yea she reacheth forth לָֽאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> to the needy

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not תִירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> She is not afraid לְבֵיתָ֣הּ <S%H1004><s%> for her household מִשָּׁ֑לֶג <S%H7950><s%> of the snow כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all בֵּ֝יתָ֗הּ <S%H1004><s%> for all her household לָבֻ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> [are] clothed שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8144><s%> with scarlet

מַרְבַדִּ֥ים <S%H4765><s%> herself coverings of tapestry עָֽשְׂתָה־ <S%H6213><s%> She maketh לָּ֑הּ שֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8336><s%> [is] silk וְאַרְגָּמָ֣ן <S%H713><s%> and purple לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H3830><s%> her clothing

נוֹדָ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> is known בַּשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <S%H8179><s%> in the gates בַּעְלָ֑הּ <S%H1167><s%> Her husband בְּ֝שִׁבְתּ֗וֹ <S%H3427><s%> when he sitteth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> among זִקְנֵי־ <S%H2205><s%> among the elders אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

סָדִ֣ין <S%H5466><s%> fine linen עָ֭שְׂתָה <S%H6213><s%> She maketh וַתִּמְכֹּ֑ר <S%H4376><s%> and selleth וַ֝חֲג֗וֹר <S%H2289><s%> girdles נָתְנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> [it] and delivereth לַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <S%H3669><s%> unto the merchant

עֹז־ <S%H5797><s%> Strength וְהָדָ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> and honour לְבוּשָׁ֑הּ <S%H3830><s%> [are] her clothing וַ֝תִּשְׂחַ֗ק <S%H7832><s%> and she shall rejoice לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in time אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> to come

פִּ֭יהָ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth פָּתְחָ֣ה <S%H6605><s%> She openeth בְחָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> with wisdom וְתֽוֹרַת־ <S%H8451><s%> [is] the law חֶ֝֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> of kindness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on לְשׁוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H3956><s%> and in her tongue

צ֭וֹפִיָּה <S%H6822><s%> She looketh well הֲלִיכ֣וֹת <S%H1979><s%> to the ways בֵּיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> of her household וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> not the bread עַ֝צְל֗וּת <S%H6104><s%> of idleness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and eateth

קָ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arise up בָ֭נֶיהָ <S%H1121><s%> Her children וַֽיְאַשְּׁר֑וּהָ <S%H833><s%> and call her blessed בַּ֝עְלָ֗הּ <S%H1167><s%> her husband וַֽיְהַֽלְלָֽהּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> [also] and he praiseth

רַבּ֣וֹת <S%H7227><s%> Many בָּ֭נוֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> have done חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> virtuously וְ֝אַ֗תְּ <S%H859><s%> you עָלִ֥ית <S%H5927><s%> but thou excellest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֻּלָּֽנָה׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

שֶׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [is] deceitful הַ֭חֵן <S%H2580><s%> Favour וְהֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [is] vain הַיֹּ֑פִי <S%H3308><s%> and beauty אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> [but] a woman יִרְאַת־ <S%H3373><s%> [that] feareth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> she תִתְהַלָּֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> she shall be praised

תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָ֭הּ מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> her of the fruit יָדֶ֑יהָ <S%H3027><s%> of her hands וִֽיהַלְל֖וּהָ <S%H1984><s%> praise בַשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <S%H8179><s%> her in the gates מַעֲשֶֽׂיהָ׃ <S%H4639><s%> and let her own works
